meanings.sent1: The uncharred wood felt smooth to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The chef carefully inspected the uncharred vegetables before adding them to the salad.
meanings.sent3: The uncharred marshmallows were the only ones left after the campfire.
meanings.sent4: Her uncharred optimism shone brightly even in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The uncharred paper remained pristine despite the raging fire around it.

meanings.sent1: The uncharred metal gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The detective found an uncharred piece of evidence at the crime scene.
meanings.sent3: The uncharred toast was a pleasant surprise for the breakfast club.
meanings.sent4: His uncharred reputation was a testament to his honesty.
meanings.sent5: The uncharred building stood out among the ruins of the fire.
